name: Pager Widget
author: Paul Ryan

sections.description:
Description: Widget that provides “Parent | Previous | Next” buttons to navigate between pages at the same hierarchy level (and up to the parent page). You can modify the settings to choose the words you want to use. To enable, first activate the plugin, then add the widget to a sidebar in the Widgets settings page.

View or contribute to the plugin source on github: https://github.com/uhm-coe/pager-widget
sections.installation:
1. Upload pager-widget.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the widget where you want it through the ‘Widgets’ menu in WordPress
  4. Adjust the settings, if necessary, after placing the widget in a widget area
